page.shortlink: api client api a5 u template expand method

argument.name: data
argument.description: The data to expand in the template.

argument.name: settings
argument.description: Either the template string, or an object with settings.

property.name: template
property.description: The template string or parse template (See *[link:A5.u.template.parse]*) to expand.

property.name: nullValue
property.description: The value to use in the template for null or undefined variables or expressions.

property.name: partials
property.description: An optional object the property names of which are the names of the partial templates and the values of which are the template for the given partial name.

page.discussion: Used to expand a template with the passed in data. The passed in template can use partial templates defined in the settings. Partial templates can be useful if the template has repeditive blocks of template (such as an address block).
